citations.narrative:
There is bare wood on 3 sides of the bottom enclosure housing approximately 30 weanling guinea pigs. Primary
enclosures for guinea pigs must be constructed of smooth materials that are impervious to liquids and moisture. Bare
wooden surfaces can retain odors, absorb moisture and liquids, and can increase disease risks. Bare wooden surfaces on
guinea pigs enclosures must be sealed or replaced with an impervious surface. Licensee must ensure that surfaces in
contact with guinea pigs are impervious to moisture so that enclosures can be repeatedly cleaned, disinfected, and won't
retain odors or moisture. Correct by March 28, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.28(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
There is bare wood on 3 sides of the bottom enclosure housing approximately 30 weanling guinea pigs. Primary 
enclosures for guinea pigs must be constructed of smooth materials that are impervious to liquids and moisture. Bare 
wooden surfaces can retain odors, absorb moisture and liquids, and can increase disease risks. Bare wooden surfaces on 
guinea pigs enclosures must be sealed or replaced with an impervious surface. Licensee must ensure that surfaces in 
contact with guinea pigs are impervious to moisture so that enclosures can be repeatedly cleaned, disinfected, and won't 
retain odors or moisture. Correct by March 28, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
